content.heroIntro:
Welcome to PURA VIDA V, an exclusive new villa development by BEST OF SPAIN located in the prestigious paraque de Andromeda, Pilar de La Horadada. This remarkable project offers contemporary 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom villas starting from €659,000, delivering exceptional value in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after locations. Each villa features 112m² of carefully designed living space set on 94m² private plots, combining modern architecture with Mediterranean charm. Scheduled for completion on 01-01-2028, PURA VIDA V represents an outstanding opportunity for discerning buyers seeking a permanent residence, holiday home, or investment property with strong rental potential.

Pilar de La Horadada has emerged as a premier destination for international buyers and expats, offering the perfect balance of coastal living and modern amenities. BEST OF SPAIN brings decades of expertise to this development, ensuring premium construction standards and meticulous attention to detail. The paraque de Andromeda location provides strategic access to stunning Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, excellent healthcare facilities, and a thriving international community where English is widely spoken.

Whether you're seeking a Mediterranean escape, a sound investment property, or a new chapter in sunny Spain, PURA VIDA V delivers exceptional quality, prime location, and outstanding value. With property appreciation showing +8% year-on-year growth and weekly rental rates reaching €800, this is more than a home—it's a smart investment in your future.

locationSection.intro: Pilar de La Horadada is a charming coastal town in southern Alicante, renowned for its welcoming international community and authentic Spanish character. The paraque de Andromeda location offers the perfect blend of tranquility and accessibility, with easy connections to major amenities while maintaining a peaceful, residential atmosphere. This area has become increasingly popular with expat buyers and investors seeking quality of life, natural beauty, and strong property appreciation. The region benefits from excellent healthcare infrastructure with the Regional hospital within 30 minutes, making it ideal for families and retirees. Multiple Blue Flag beaches are just 20 minutes away, offering pristine Mediterranean coastline for swimming, water sports, and beach clubs. The area's growing reputation as a premier European destination has attracted world-class golf courses, boutique restaurants, and high-end shopping centers. Pilar de La Horadada combines the relaxed pace of a traditional Spanish town with the modern conveniences and international amenities expected by contemporary buyers.
